bilingual.source: Tell him directly and honestly that you were talking without thinking.
bilingual.target: 直接诚实地告诉他你说话不经过思考。

bilingual.source: I had trouble thinking clearly after that because I was very afraid.
bilingual.target: 之后我很难清晰地思考，因为我非常害怕。

bilingual.source: "Thinking is a more important ability than note-taking and memorising," he said.
bilingual.target: “思考比记笔记和背诵更重要，”他说。

bilingual.source: We can improve our writing by thinking carefully about the words we use.
bilingual.target: 我们可以通过仔细思考我们使用的词语来改进写作。

bilingual.source: Positive thinking, along with a little action, will help you turn your ideas into reality.
bilingual.target: 积极思考，加上一点行动，会帮助你将想法变为现实。

bilingual.source: He nibbled on his pencil while thinking.
She taps the table when she is thinking.
bilingual.target: 她在思考时会轻拍桌子。

yingyinNormal.en: Thinking caps on. Here we go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我戴上我的思考小帽了。开始吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I started thinking about it in two ways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在从两个方面思考这个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: And I started thinking about when the morning might come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我开始思考自己的曙光何时到来。

yingyinNormal.en: So when you're thinking hard, you're getting smarter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此只要你们努力思考，你们就会变得越来越聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: And that begins with thinking rationally. You understand? Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就需要你从理性思考开始，你听懂了吗？好的。

yingyinNormal.en: George is thinking. And you can play with all my toys. George is thinking more. And when we get home, you can play with all my toys. George has decided. What a sweet baby piggy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治在思考。而且你可以玩我所有的玩具。乔治在努力思考。等我们回家之后，也可以玩我所有的玩具。乔治做好了决定。真是个可爱的猪宝宝。

yingyinNormal.en: It's beautiful. Good, guess, what's it looks like its doing? Like it's thinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真漂亮很好，猜猜它像是在做什么？像是在思考。

yingyinNormal.en: And I remember standing there that day thinking about the disturbers of mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还记得那天站在那里思考着"破坏我和谐的人"。

yingyinNormal.en: When the scandals with Enron were becoming apparent, I started thinking about cheating.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当安然公司的丑闻浮出水面，我开始思考欺骗。

yingyinNormal.en: A particular type of scientist, called a cosmologist, spends her time thinking about that very question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一种科学家，被称为宇宙学家，她们就专门思考这样的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: The rest of you are gonna spend the afternoon thinking about that, with the exception of Lucas the good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们其他人今天下午就好好思考一下这个问题，好孩子卢卡斯除外。

yingyinNormal.en: Good thinking, Cogsworth! What? That's the most ridiculous idea I've ever heard! Charm the prisoner?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要善于思考。葛士华！什么？这是我听过的最荒谬的想法！让仇人爱上我？

yingyinNormal.en: That's a really great game, Leon. Makes people nicer. Starts them thinking. The kind of game you love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个很棒的游戏，里昂，让人变得聪明，学会思考，你喜欢的那种游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: He's not moving. He's thinking. He's really not moving. Slow but sure, John, not dissimilar to yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没走。正在思考呢。他真的没在走。乌龟比兔子先到终点，约翰，跟你差不多。

yingyinNormal.en: And now for Daddy Pig's puddle jump. Daddy pig is thinking. Ready, steady, go. I must become one with the puddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，现在有请猪爸爸来跳泥坑吧。猪爸爸在思考。预备，跳。我一定要和这个泥坑融为一体。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm thinking about how one could use the fact that a rapidly rotating mirror turns virtual photons into real ones as a method of observing dark energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在思考，高速自转的镜子可以将虚光子转成真光子这一现象如何运用在获取暗能量上。

yingyinNormal.en: One way to think about the anchors is that it's the first time we encounter a price, it's the first time we think about the particular decision, and that way of thinking about the decision sticks with us for a long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: “锚”其实是指我们第一次遇见的价格，第一次思考并作出决定购买的价格，往后会长时间影响我们。

yingyinNormal.en: The point is Higgs is being celebrated for work he did 50 years ago, so that got me thinking, perhaps I've already hit upon the idea that will win me my Nobel prize.
yingyinNormal.zh: 重点是希格斯正被人赞赏着他50年前的发现，这让我不禁思考，说不定我早想到了值得得奖的东西，而它们就藏在这些日志里。

yingyinNormal.en: Who are you thinking about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在考虑谁？

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking more like rain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想到的则是下雨天。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 想法; 看法; 观点
有思想的; 认真思考的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想不到的；不可能的；想象不到的
adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 不为他人着想的；不顾及他人的；不考虑后果的；轻率的
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
v. 过度思考；过分考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

examination_example.sentence: Objective <highlight>thinking</highlight> may boost intuitiveness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 客观思考可以增强直觉。

examination_example.sentence: This very fact embodied the new ways of <highlight>thinking</highlight> that swept through Europe during most of 17th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一事实体现了17世纪大部分时间席卷欧洲的新思维方式。

examination_example.sentence: To put it another way: How can we make sure that the <highlight>thinking</highlight> of intelligent machines reflects humanity's highest values?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说：我们如何确保智能机器的思维反映了人类的最高价值观？

sense_info_list.zh: 想法; 看法; 观点

examination_example.sentence: People can contribute experience or information to your <highlight>thinking</highlight>—all the things that would make the disagreement stronger or more valid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人可以为你的想法贡献他们的经验或信息——所有这些都会使分歧更强烈或更有效。

examination_example.sentence: This kind of <highlight>thinking</highlight> is why so many people try to avoid arguments, especially about politics and religion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种想法就是为什么那么多人尽量避免争论，尤其是关于政治和宗教的争论。

examination_example.sentence: School districts across the country, most recently Los Angeles Unified, are revising their <highlight>thinking</highlight> on this educational ritual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全国各地的学区（最近是洛杉矶联合大学）正在修改他们对这种教育仪式的想法。

sense_info_list.zh: 有思想的; 认真思考的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的

adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: the process of thinking about something

examination_example.sentence: It is conducive to critical <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于批判性思维。

examination_example.sentence: As lives are affected by any number of looming challenges—climate crisis, automation in the workplace—humans are going to need creative <highlight>thinking</highlight> more than ever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着生活受到许多迫在眉睫的挑战的影响——气候危机、工作场所自动化——人类将比以往任何时候都更需要创造性思维。

examination_example.sentence: The report concludes that creativity should not inhabit the school curriculum only, but that creative <highlight>thinking</highlight> ought to run through all of school life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告的结论是，创造力不应该只存在于学校课程中，创造性思维应该贯穿于学校生活的方方面面。

examination_example.sentence: The board game Go (围棋) took over from chess as a new test for human <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 战略棋类游戏围棋取代了国际象棋，成为人类思维的决定性测试方法。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 批判思维；批判思考；批判性想法

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: the process of thinking about something

examination_example.sentence: "When people enter into that pattern <highlight>thinking</highlight>, " says Kendall-Taylor, "it's cognitively comfortable to make sense of issues of poverty in that way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当人们进入这种模式思维时，”肯德尔-泰勒说，“用这种方式理解贫困问题在认知上是很舒服的。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine a drug that could enhance a child's creativity and critical <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一种可以增强孩子创造力和批判性思维的药物。

examination_example.sentence: You just have to do a little <highlight>thinking</highlight> ahead and redefine what qualifies as dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只需要提前想一下，重新定义什么是晚餐。

examination_example.sentence: This may be driven partly by self-deception or "wishful <highlight>thinking</highlight>''.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在一定程度上可能是由自欺欺人或“一厢情愿”促成的。

examination_example.sentence: This argument has its critics, but considering the way chores are undertaken around the world may change people's <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一观点有其批评者，但考虑到世界各地的家务劳动方式可能会改变人们的想法。

examination_example.sentence: As they explain the information to it, they identify problems in their own <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在讲解的过程中，他们会发现自己的思路存在哪些问题。

examination_example.sentence: But what if we're actually getting closer to a world where Al is capable of <highlight>thinking</highlight> and feeling?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但如果我们真的越来越接近一个阿尔能够思考和感受的世界呢？

examination_example.sentence: I composed my lectures on the way, and that was all the <highlight>thinking</highlight> time I had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在路上写讲稿，那是我所有的思考时间。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers examined various levels of noise on participants as they completed tests of creative <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在参与者完成创造性思维测试时，研究人员对他们进行了不同程度的噪音测试。

正面思考；积极思考；积极思想

sense_info_list.en: the process of thinking about something

examination_example.sentence: Color adds great energy to your creative <highlight>thinking</highlight>, and is fun!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 色彩为你的创造性思维增添了巨大的能量，而且很有趣!

examination_example.sentence: But now I have noticed a change in my <highlight>thinking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但现在我注意到我的想法有了变化。

examination_example.sentence: Critical <highlight>thinking</highlight> is important and stops us from making poor choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批判性思维很重要，它能阻止我们做出糟糕的选择。
